message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for the product.
